entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Windows: dotnet workload restore: Workload update failed: Could not find a part of the path #48769
  • [NETSDKE2E]Libicu package dependency issue with .NET 8.0 and 9.0 May 2025 Update builds on Ubuntu25.04 #48767
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc][Regression]With NET 10 preview4 SDK installed in loc OS, some strings are not localized in output of "dotnet build --help". #48765
  • dotnet run #48764
  • [NETSDKE2E][VMR][Regression][VScode]ASP.Net symbols are missing for IL symbols. #48762

Closed

  • Unable to publish multiple projects at the same time. #7238
    Discussion
  • Reenable the `Microsoft.DotNet.Cli.Run.Tests.GivenDotnetRunBuildsCsproj.ItDefaultsToTheFirstUsableLaunchProfile` test #42841
    10.0.1xx
  • [NETSDKE2E][VMR]telemetry events cannot displays in fiddler tool. #48516
  • [NETSDKE2E][VMR][Regression]CoreFX symbols are missing for IL symbols. #48716

PullRequests

Created

  • Unify the nullable reference type approaches #48776
    Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48775
  • Add 9.0.3xx to the branch lockdown labeler #48774
  • Remove unnecessary CA2022 suppressions #48766
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Enable container test execution #48763
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix launch profile test failure #48713
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [StaticWebAssets] Fix missing endpoints #48773
  • Fix source-only jobs to not test in UB #48772
  • [10.0.1xx-preview4] Consolidate UB and SB pipelines #48703
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #48761
    Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Ignore .slnx #48729
    Servicing-consider, Branch Lockdown
  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Add suppressor support for `dotnet format` #48512
    untriaged, Area-Format
  • Local dev props #48739
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support build/restore of file-based programs #48662
    Area-run-file
  • Add file-based program API for use by IDE #48749
    Area-run-file
  • sln-add: Don't add solution folders outside the scope of solution directory #48611
    Servicing-approved, Area-CLI, Branch Lockdown, 9.0.6
  • Use LangVersion=Preview #48747
    Area-Infrastructure
  • macOS Installer: Update relese notes link #48722
    Servicing-approved, Branch Lockdown, 9.0.6
  • [WIP] `dotnet tool exec <package[@version]>` one-shot execution #48443
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Update multi-file 'dotnet run file' documentation #48437
    documentation, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Add trailing slash for -o Fixes #45682 #48640
    untriaged, Area-CLI
